themes: need for improved grant application support
concern about restrictive grant criteria limiting creativity
exclusion of artists/events not serving specific populations
expansion of Creative Space Assistance Program eligibility
key_phrases: grants are great but they limit artists
curbs creativity even though it has good intent
punishes those who have events or activities that don't serve a specific underserved population
expand the Creative Space Assistance Program to individual artists
barriers_identified: grant criteria limit artists to serving certain populations
creativity is curbed by restrictive requirements
events or activities not serving a specific underserved population are punished
solutions_proposed: make more programs that can help organizations apply successfully
expand the Creative Space Assistance Program to individual artists
